article_title: Minimizing The 'Oops Factor' In Decision Making

article_metadata.description: In politics and business, “unintended consequences” is the handy term for outcomes that are not the ones foreseen by a purposeful act. When Nancy Pelosi famously said of ObamaCare “We have to pass this bill so you can find out what’s in it,” she likely did not foresee the coming firestorm [...]
article_metadata.author: Rodger Dean Duncan
